kp5:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
kp5:1.3: Then, late at night, a glorious deity, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, went up to the Buddha, bowed, stood to one side, and said to him:
kp5:1.4: Standing to one side, that deity addressed the Buddha in verse:
kp5:3.3: and honoring those worthy of honor:
